creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
inscription: 好之米家山水〇読書〇事〇雲煙吾〇〇我〇〇〇〇〇〇〇〇也 (?)
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #3]; poem poem LL red seals: 字曰子徳 {azana iwaku Shitoku}, 静處 {seisho} [seisho #3]; LLC: 蓬莱山下人 {Hōraisan genin}
signed:
昭和戊辰夏日於東山寓居古道人詩畫 {Shōwa tsuchinoe-tatsu kajitsu oite Higashiyama gūkyo Kodōjin shiga} (Summer day in 1928, at a temporary abode in Higashiyama, poem and painting by Kodōjin)

昭和戊辰夏日於東山寓居古道人詩畫 (A summer day in 1928 at Temporary Abode at the East Mountain, poetry and painting by Kodōjin)
title: High Waterfall and Rolling Peaks
